title: Inventory Manager
description: Inventory Manager is a full-stack application developed as part of my final project. The software is used to manage inventory, maintenance, and orders. It consists of a FastAPI backend and a React frontend built with Vite and TypeScript.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal, multilingual portfolio website showcasing my projects and technical skills. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with a strong focus on clean structure, responsiveness, and intuitive navigation.
